title: Addictive Asian beef coleslaw
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon rapeseed oil', '4 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste', '1 tablespoon minced fresh ginger', '450g beef steak mince', '1/2 head white cabbage, shredded', '1/2 head red cabbage, shredded', '2 large carrots, peeled and cut into thin strips', '1 red pepper, cut into very thin strips', '120ml reduced salt soy sauce', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', '1 dash hot chilli sauce, or to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons freshly chopped coriander, or to taste', 'lime wedges, to serve']
